Reviews.Title: Recent changes make this a BIG thumbs DOWN
Reviews.Author: CrankySpice
Reviews.Content: When I first got this app, it was great. Lots of shows available with lots of past season content. Their contracting must have changed recently with several networks as shows that formerly had full past seasons and full current seasons are now reduced to the past 3 every other episodes.Yes, you read that correctly. You don't get ANY past seasons and only every other episode for the current season, with a limit of 3 total. So you'll have episodes 1,3, & 5 and won't be able to see 2,4 & 6 to see what actually happened in between. Makes it rather useless for keeping up with new shows when you can only see half of the season and not in a logical order.Considering this app is part of a PAID cable subscription, I'm EXTREMELY disappointed. Clearly they are not interested in keeping their on-the-go customers. I'll more than likely cancel my cable subscription and view shows on other PTV apps/sites and save myself some money in the long run.Way to drive away current and future consumers, Comcast! Portable viewing is the future of TV and you just shot yourselves in the foot.

Reviews.Title: A big improvement over the old Xfinity app - 4½ stars
Reviews.Author: J. Chambers
Reviews.Content: I'm running the "Xfinity TV Go" app on my Kindle Fire HDX 7". After installing the app, entering my Comcast ID and password, and declining to use the parental controls, it was ready to go. Basically, the new app does what the old Xfinity player did, with one big new feature that many people have been begging Xfinity for: It streams live TV. For now at least, the live shows are mostly news and sports channels, but hopefully that's just a start. The live channels include Fox News, CNN, MSNBC, BBC World News, and several other news channels. Sports Channels include ESPN (it's actually just a link to the Watch ESPN app), Fox Sports, Golf Channel, and a few others. The National Geographic and National Geographic Wild channels are included. Note that the audio volume can only be controlled from your tablet, and there's an option to turn on closed captioning.Another very nice new feature is the ability to download some TV shows and movies onto your tablet and take them with you for offline viewing later. I haven't tried this yet, and it's not entirely clear to me how to find eligible shows, although there is a help screen.Overall, the app is a big improvement over the earlier Xfinity app that it replaces. Hopefully Xfinity will add more live channels, but for now, having a good selection of news and sports is a very promising beginning.

If you purchase HBO, Starz, and a lot of options beyond basic cable, you will have a lot to watch.  If your plan is basic cable, you won't have many offerings.Over all, the Xfinity Ap pales in comparison to the Netflix Ap in structure, organization, and download speed.  Netflix also rarely bas the hesitations with video playback that the Xfinity Ap has.The Netflix Ap itself , which I have used for a year, has none of the crashing, hesitation, etc. that I mention above that plagues the Xfinity Ap.Overall, I rate the Xfinity ap 2/5 stars, mainly because it was free.  If I had to pay for it, I would rate it a 1/5 and not purchase it.  There are too many other ways to get HD onto my tablet.Gregg

Reviews.Title: Love this app but its still glitchy
Reviews.Author: Sassy Sweetpea
Reviews.Content: I love this App & it's in my top 5 most used Apps with a great variety of content available! We quit our Comcast cable but still have phone & internet at home, internet at a second residence & pay a portion of my parents Triple Play account. Since we share our Amazon Prime, Netflix, & Hulu+ accounts with my parents via a Roku player (and pay a portion of their Comcast cable bill), we now have access to HBO, Showtime & all the other shows available via the Xfinity TV player app on our Kindle Fires (currently Hubby & I both have HDX versions).When we first used the App.starting 12/2012 (on a KF HD 7" & 8.9") there was the "too low volume issue" which required headphones to hear content properly. Thankfully, after almost a year they FINALLY fixed that problem!More.recently, my app was working correctly on my new HDX for the first few weeks in Dec 2013 but then started lagging badly. I'm pretty tech savvy and (apparently) took many more steps than the 3 Kindle specialists & 1 App store specialist I spoke with said they'd have even thought to suggest. I've sent a note via "report an issue" below and the App Store specialist has logged the issue extensively and reported to the developer directly. The same exact show will play fine on Amazon Prime or Hulu but is slightly choppy & often buffers when played via the Xfinity app. It's not so bad that the audio & video are out of sync, but almost. It's as if you're watching stop-motion video... everyone is moving just a little slow and choppy. It's noticeable enough to be annoying. As mentioned, I've done major troubleshooting including uninstalling & reinstalling app, hard resets, resetting my Xfinity modem, my router and releasing/renewing my IP address and more. Speed tests using multiple random servers show my average download speeds between 43-50 Mbps. It's not my WiFi. (I prefer watching via Xfinity app where possible because if there are commercials they usually lump them into a large 3-4 min section vs Hulu who may have 30-120 seconds of commercials every 10 minutes.If you're having any issues please contact the developers via the "report an issue" button below and/or Amazon. The developers (Comcast) do not read these reviews. If nobody speaks up the developers don't know there are issues.Two other things that really need to be addressed/fixed:1) anytime I log out or am required to clear the data, clear the cache, force stop & uninstall/reinstall any other video app such as Netflix, Hulu, etc., When you log back in all your preferences & bookmarks, favorites, history is still there. Not so with the Xfinity app. Even if you SIM p lying log out & back in you must find, bookmark & reorder (put them in a particular order by un-bookmarking & re-bookmarking in order) your favorite shows all over again.2) I'm still noticing multiple shows that are not being updated with the latest episode even days or longer after its aired while they are added to Hulu sometimes just after midnight of the day they played on TV.A recent example is Grimm. The most recent episode aired on Jan. 19th and was available on Hulu+ in the early morning hours of Jan. 20th (just after midnight PST, 3am EST). It's now 11pm PST/2am EST Jan. 23rd and the episode is still not available on the Xfinity app.Hoping these issues will all be very soon addressed in an update!

Reviews.Title: only good if you have starz and showtime
Reviews.Author: James Kvapil
Reviews.Content: Good for tv shows if you have cable, terrible for movies if you only have streampix. There are only 8 movies you can download with this app and streampix, however the options are much better if you have a starz or showtime subscription. Hbo has its own app. This app is pretty useless without the ability to stream live tv.

Reviews.Title: Can only see some of the channels
Reviews.Author: G. Garland "Dooley the Clown"
Reviews.Content: I was expecting an app that would allow me to access the Xfinity web site where I watch TV shows and movies.  My expectations were not at all met.  This app only allows a very few channels compared to what I can get when on a computer.  Also, normally speaking I would expect an app to allow easier access.  Wrong again.  It takes longer to find shows that are available on this app.  All in all, I guess if it is all you have, it would be better than nothing, but still leaves a lot to me desired.  It isn't totally useless so I gave it two stares.

Reviews.Title: Did not work with my TV
Reviews.Author: David M. Neely
Reviews.Content: I guess my big TV is too old for this product! What annoyed me is that I sent them an email asking for a code or the correct one but it was never answered.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity player disappoints
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: We have Xfinity so I had high hopes for this app. I was let down. I was only able to access cable channels and not some of my other favorites, such as NBC, CBS, ABC, CW, and FOX Networks. One would think that when you had Xfinity you would be able to access all of the stuff you pay for at home

Reviews.Title: not too bad but
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: I really wish more shows that are available on Xfinity Online or Xfinity On Demand were available on the app (like the basic networks - ABC, NBC, CBS, Fox, The CW and their shows). I do like that you have the option of downloading some shows/movies to save for later and that you can bookmark your favorite shows so they are easier to get to.

Reviews.Title: failed to. loadlad to kindle
Reviews.Author: Francis Pfeiffer
Reviews.Content: Never loaded to my kindle fire? Why?so since Amazon failed to load it -never had it to and I am an Xfinity customer

Reviews.Title: poor selection
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: there is a poor selection of tv shows and movies.  Most movies require subscriptions to HBO, Showtime, etc.  There are are many more tv shows on xfinity "on demand".

Reviews.Title: Ok but not great.
Reviews.Author: Lawrenc J Lawson
Reviews.Content: I thought the Xfinity app was ok but not as good as on the iPad/iPad mini.  My wife has a iPad mini and HD movies stream wonderfully!  Crystal clear and very fast.  The Kindle is HD but HD movies absolutely DO NOT steam in HD.  I was quite disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Marked Improvement
Reviews.Author: J Taylor
Reviews.Content: When they updated from Xfinity Player to Xfinity TV Go, the volume started working better and FX, FXX, news and sports channels started streaming.  Load time has increased a little, but that's an acceptable tradeoff.  Of course, it would be nice if Viacom network shows were available or if cable wasn't so absurdly overpriced, but you can't have everything.

Reviews.Title: No support for original Kindle Fire with latest update!
Reviews.Author: Emi
Reviews.Content: No support for original Kindle Fire users? Why kill an app I used frequently with an update that only benefits new users? Boo to not supporting your existing customer base.

Reviews.Title: XFINITY App for older Kindle Fire's
Reviews.Author: Mon Sherrie "Avid Kindle Fire owner!  Can har...
Reviews.Content: Does not work at all, says "incompatible".  How frustrating when you've been an XFINITY user since it's inception!  Wish they'd work this out!

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV Player
Reviews.Author: B. Beechner
Reviews.Content: After a smooth install, player requires to much input to get working.  First, you have to be a COMCAST Cable customer or you have to go to their site and fill out what amounts to a contract just to try it.  Too much user information required.  Once installed I could not uninstall it.  Shows up in application screens but not installation settings so you can force stop it or uninstall it if you wish.  Now I have to live with it and can't use it.

Reviews.Title: Less shows
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this app because I wanted to watch the latest episode of Big Brother.  I turned off the parental guard, and I typed Big Brother in the search box.  Nothing.  I went to the list of TV shows and looked for the show.  Nope.  I now realize that the app does not offer the same shows as the full website.  Why would I expect anything different from Comcast?  Comcast, I hate you and I always have.  Good day, Sir.

Reviews.Title: Only for Comcast subcsribers!
Reviews.Author: VA Patriot "VA Patriot"
Reviews.Content: Unless your a Comcast subscriber, Don't waste your time with this app. Amazon needs to highlight this in the description.

Reviews.Title: Fed up with Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: JoVanDuranMode
Reviews.Content: I am sick of not being able to download apps to my Kindle Fire because they are not compatible with this device. What is the point of having them on here if they don't work? I even have emailed about this and was told to call and get help that way. WTF? Why can't they just email me back and help me out that way? I can't wait to buy an Ipad and will be able to acually purchase apps and have them actually work and not have to deal with compatibility issues. I am through with Kindles,ugh!!!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work with 1st gen Kindle Fire.
Reviews.Author: Ron Fifer
Reviews.Content: I wanted an app that worked with Kindle Fire 1st gen. This app didn't I did not find out about this shortcoming until after installation.

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with the orginal Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Wish they could do some upgrade to let an xfinity app work on the orginal Kindle Fire or Flash work

Reviews.Title: big disappointment, my kindle fire is not compatible! !!
Reviews.Author: PATRICK
Reviews.Content: My family has four kindles, but come to find out the original fire is not a supported device for xfinity player. I guess we have to buy different tablets after all.

Reviews.Title: Why isn't it available for Kindle Fire?
Reviews.Author: C. Haze
Reviews.Content: Could you please make this available for the regular Kindle. Why isn't it? I can get it on my android phone but not the kindle. This makes no sense. Kindle apps are always slow or non existent.

Reviews.Title: No Network TV
Reviews.Author: James R. Eberly
Reviews.Content: The only reason I got this was to watch the shows I missed from the week while at a hotel, but this app does not have any network television.  I subscribe to xfinity and can watch all shows on-demand from home, one would think you could watch from your tablet as well.

Reviews.Title: continously CRASHES
Reviews.Author: Tracy Meade "Tray"
Reviews.Content: It was working ok until today but now crashes continously. Tried reinstalling several times but did not help. unusable at this point.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Terrence L. Gray "RadMan49"
Reviews.Content: I can download movies to watch later without internet connection. Excellent App. Also can watch different tv shows on different networks.

Reviews.Title: Not what i thought
Reviews.Author: G. Douglas
Reviews.Content: not what i thought it would be, you would need  XFINITY TV or Comcast Digital Video service. You will also need a subscription to one or more eligible channels to play content.• Comcast ID or Comcast.net email address and password.Streaming and downloading of video is not available internationally.

Reviews.Title: Not liking this
Reviews.Author: Meg Berns
Reviews.Content: I thought I would be able to access more shows and movies but very limited to those I dont care about

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Mark Evers
Reviews.Content: Not always the biggest fan of Comcast but works great on my Fire. Can also download some shows to watch when out of wi-fi range. Five stars if it had network shows

Reviews.Title: not compatable
Reviews.Author: Garry E. Welsh
Reviews.Content: This app is not compatable with first gen kindle fire.It would have been nice if that info was displayed.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Daniel Fisher
Reviews.Content: You guys need to make this for the kindle fires. I feel that I am being shorted because of you guys not loading apps like this for the kindle fires...

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Robbins
Reviews.Content: Great app! Excellent for watching tv and movies anytime and just about anywhere. You can pass the time with your favorite program.

Reviews.Title: not a free app
Reviews.Author: cembi2790
Reviews.Content: not account comcast member did not know that I would have to give up personal information. not a free app if you have to give up credit card information.

Reviews.Title: tv player
Reviews.Author: Lillian Bears
Reviews.Content: You need to have a subscription to comcast to use this. When I purchased this I did not realize that that was the case.  Maybe it would be ok for those customers who have comcast, can't say.

Reviews.Title: It may work if you can download it.
Reviews.Author: Louis V.
Reviews.Content: What would you have wanted to know before you purchased the product?That it didn't work.I spent about an hour trying to download to my Kindle Fire (1st gen). A couple of times, although it said Xfinity TV Player, I got some other app. Maybe its a compatibility problem, but from what I read, it should work on a Kindle Fire.Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: I wish
Reviews.Author: KidShufflingMom
Reviews.Content: I wish this app had the big networks like ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX and the CW. I would've given it 5, if it had. The rest works great and I enjoy all of the On Demand stuff. It's fun and useful, just my wish and it could've been perfect. Works fantastic on my kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Great app. Great picture and clarity for all your favorite shows.
Reviews.Author: ezboomer
Reviews.Content: Especially nice to have when you are out of town and want to watch favorite shows that you missed.As long as you are near or have your own Wi-Fi connection you always have your favorite shows with youwith your tablet or laptop.

Reviews.Title: Misleading company
Reviews.Author: Jimel Ferguson "sprite123"
Reviews.Content: The choices  of movies that are free are ancient.  Way back to the 80's.  The tv shows are  not worth watching.  The tv player is slow and boring.  Seems to work only on my ipod and not the kindle.  Oh yeah, it does work on my phone but why waste the battery on that junk.

Reviews.Title: greedy, obnoxious comcast
Reviews.Author: D. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: This app used to work great until a recent update prohibited playback when a cable is connected to your Kindle. I used to stream shows and on demand movies to our bedroom tv (not worth having an additional cable box up there), but now the always-greedy Comcast says you can't do that. As far as watching content only on the tablet goes, the application works fine, but this is an unnecessary and obnoxious restriction that other apps haven't incorporated. They are essentially limiting the capabilities of a device that I own.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: shirleyg
Reviews.Content: Once you get it downloaded it is very easy to use.  After reading other reviews I can rest easy---it is very hard to hear.  Not hard when there are no other sounds around though.  Love the fact I can watch what I want when other family members are watching something on the television .

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV Player
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Live TV needs to be the major networks live.Only a handful of shows offered live.  Mostly sports.Thank you

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: L. Coirier "mom of two"
Reviews.Content: I can watch something different than the family at home now! There are four of us, and we do not always agree. I can also watch programs that may not be of interest or appropriate for the kids.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Channel
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Marshall Jr. "Zack Attack"
Reviews.Content: I have the Xfinity App on the iPad.  This implementation falls far short of what it does on the iPad.  This only allows one to order a movie for PPV download.  The iPad implementation allows one to change channels on every home TV connected in the house and numerous sorts on available programming with integrated DTV programming. I uninstalled this app.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Thanks Comcast - works great!  Nice to catch up on programs missed.  Why do I have to write 15 words?

Reviews.Title: This works very well.
Reviews.Author: Bucky Burnsed
Reviews.Content: I amp very pleased with this app.  It loads cleanly and operates very smooth.  I'm very happy with this app.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Lisa B
Reviews.Content: The ease and options of this app are wonderful for my kids kindle fires! We do have a Comcast account to use all the features.

Reviews.Title: great app but needs improvement
Reviews.Author: conscientious consumer
Reviews.Content: I recently downloaded this app and so far I am fairly satisfied with it. My only issue with is that none of the major networks are available such as CBS, NBC, FOX, etc. This is my only issue and if these networks get added then this will be a 5-star app in my book

Reviews.Title: Impressed with the app
Reviews.Author: Shawn Spragg
Reviews.Content: I've been using this app and a micro hd to hdmi cable to play shows on my t.v. and it works great!  Awesome to watch in bed rather than only where my cable box is.  And it's a great mix of available shows.

Reviews.Title: This app is okay, but it hangs up during playback, when it tries to buffer
Reviews.Author: Ronald Hendrix
Reviews.Content: I expected much better from xfinity , this application is okay, but it takes multiple tries to get video, and live broadcast to run smoothly, without hanging up while trying to buffer.  Also I expected to be able to get all available shows that are available with my television service contract, but some channels, and programming are not available. That sucks.

Reviews.Title: ok application for the price
Reviews.Author: jackherron
Reviews.Content: I wish it had more content, a lot of really old movies and only a small part of their on tv networks.

Reviews.Title: worth it
Reviews.Author: Julian C. Johnson III
Reviews.Content: Makes me feel that the over-the-top cost of the full tilt comcast bundle might be worth it.Unfortunately, I'm not usually away from home, so I rarely get to use it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Jan Mamula
Reviews.Content: The whole family thinks this is terrific!! It really entertains the kids where ever we are and it works on all their devices.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I have been trying to get Comcast to work on my kindle fire.  I was hopeful that this would work but it doesn't.  Very disappointed and frustrated.

Reviews.Title: constant buffering, then freezes
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: Not very happy with this app. I tried to watch numerous movies, but within seconds of starting, they begin to buffer, then freeze up. I've been a Comcast client for years, so this was quite a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Awesome app
Reviews.Author: Victoria Mathis "vic"
Reviews.Content: I really like this app.  It is very convenient to use.  Who ever thought of it, I want to say , Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed and aggrivated now
Reviews.Author: memememe
Reviews.Content: Continuously got errors.  Rather than watching the show I spent my time fighting errors.  Deleting app.  A review that require me to say more than I wanted to is equally irritating

Reviews.Title: Interesting
Reviews.Author: H. Mitchell "LADYSPIRIT"
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect, but I do like the app. Not a whole lot of variety, but, it does work well. So far no complaints.

Reviews.Title: not downloaded
Reviews.Author: Archie J.Williams,Sr
Reviews.Content: was not downloaded .  canceled and not useed on my kindle could not  get a password to use this app.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: flounderguts
Reviews.Content: App looks great and navigation is easy, for the most part. However, standard definition playback stops to buffer 4 minutes for every 3 of video. Also, when buffering it will tell you it's "waiting for internet connection" while firmly connected to XFinity's own wired source with no other connections to the device. I have a hard time believing that Comcast would throttle it's own source content, so I have to conclude it's either the software or an issue with the video library...probably the latter, as I have found that a message claiming source errors comes up rather frequently. While I'm sure if I phone XFinity support they will tell me to spend a lot of money upgrading to the latest, greatest X1 system, I am in fact LESS INCLINED to make use or pay for premium services if the basic functionality of added services is as lacklustre as the performance of the main function of this app and it's support.

Reviews.Title: The player only works half the time
Reviews.Author: C. Brooke
Reviews.Content: When the app does work the picture is crisp and it is a good experience. And the search function is very useful.The problem is that when I try to use it about half the time it never loads the program. I can see the first image of the program but then it just freezes. Sometimes I close the app and restart it and then it works fine. Other times it doesn't so I just watch a different program instead.If it didn't have the problem freezing I'd give it five stars. But even though sometimes it doesn't work, I like it when it does.When using the app I did discover some new programs that are on Comcast that I never knew about. I've had cable TV for years but tend to watch the same programs all the time. The XFINITY TV Go introduced me to new programs. (I watched them because a couple of programs I wanted to see wouldn't load and kept buffering.)

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your storage...or your time
Reviews.Author: Cash Lowery
Reviews.Content: Horrible...signed into my account and even had all my info verified but would not play. It would start to but just stop cold after the 7 second  mark. Waste of time. Hate this product. Fix or I will get a different cable service all together.

Reviews.Title: always glitches
Reviews.Author: Miss Bee
Reviews.Content: Has a lot of issues with glitches, it says no signal when signal is very strong.Comcast  should update app to fix this issue.

Reviews.Title: love/hate
Reviews.Author: Dreamere124 "Dreamere124"
Reviews.Content: Love the portability of getting to see my shows-hate the excessive amounts of commercials I must ensure to get thru a show.  I understand the commercials are necessary but really!  Why so many?  Otherwise I'm good with it.

Reviews.Title: huge disappointment
Reviews.Author: Jessica Buehner
Reviews.Content: Who is controlling the shows and networks that are on this? No comedy central, no pbs. The commercials are 4 minutes long and the show is only 1 minute segments! They even play adds for shows they don't provide!

Reviews.Title: Comcast Delivers With Mobile On Demand
Reviews.Author: Mylgon
Reviews.Content: To be honest: rarely do I have much to say about Comcast that is positive. In this case, however, Comcast has done very well. The XFINITY TV Go application serves its purpose by delivering on demand content to mobile devices and, surprisingly, the available inventory of content is fantastic.The application itself is very easy to navigate - tracking down a television show or movie is simple. The quality of the video is superb and, so long as you have a solid connection, the streaming is unhindered by annoying buffering.If you have XFINITY, download this app, register your account to gain access to XFINITY TV Go and start enjoying your shows away from home or when accessing a television may not be feasible. I highly recommend this product for Comcast subscribers.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Cory Johns
Reviews.Content: I just downloaded this last night and got signed in. I was able to easily find the show I wanted to watch and had no lag or buffering delays. So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Love this app!
Reviews.Author: salina
Reviews.Content: Love this app! No buffering or no commericals/ads as others have mentioned.  I've watched movies on my Note 3 phone & my LG tablet from Verizon.  I haven't tried it on my Kindle yet but the content is up to date and I do have Xfinity internet (wifi), phone & cable so I don't know if that makes a difference. It works perfectly for me. Had it for a month now & have not had any problems. I haven't tried downloading any movies so don't know if it works well. From my experience with streaming I doubt there will be any problems.

Reviews.Title: The Xfinity App Hopeful
Reviews.Author: Denise J. Ford
Reviews.Content: The first day I downloaded the app to my Kindle it worked great and I watched a TV show for the first time.  The second day I tried to watch on my Kindle I got an error notice that the app was unavailable at the time and to please try again later.  I have only used the app once on my iPhone and it worked well there so must retry it a couple of more times on each media in order to see if it still continues to have the problem on my Kindle and if the same problem shows up on my iPhone at any time.  Stay tuned (pun intended).

Reviews.Title: Not working on Kindle Fire. Blech.
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: So frustrating. Plays for a minute or so, then starts to buffer for a minute, then stops. I go back and restart the program, and it replays the initial ad, does the same thing. Very rarely, after the first 'lock-up' it will go on to play the whole program. But 98% of the time, it fails. I do not understand... Amazon, Hulu, Netflix, even PBS have apps for Kindle Fire that work well. Comcast, however, can charge its cable subscribers huge fees for mediocre, oversubscribed service, and cannot even provide an app that works at all!

Reviews.Title: unreliable.
Reviews.Author: trixie
Reviews.Content: Unreliable performance. Stops and starts randomly. Commercials play and replay looped even when the counter states program would resume. Often times just plainly won't work, gives a blank screen that completely stops responding.

Reviews.Title: Does NOT work on Kindle Fire 1st Gen.
Reviews.Author: G. Arnott "Happy Camper"
Reviews.Content: AND WHY NOT?  WHY does this app not work?  WHY do I have to BUY a newer Kindle to get THIS APP to work?  Oh well.....sigh.....I guess I will have to spank my inner moppet and live with it.  Bottom line.....IF you own a 1st Gen Kindle skip this app.

Reviews.Title: great app for watching tv/movies
Reviews.Author: C. Gammicchia "The answers are within"
Reviews.Content: I love the download option since I don't always have wi-fi available. However, they should offer all the movies for download

Reviews.Title: slowly but surely locking up all the programming I want to watch
Reviews.Author: jjoeyp
Reviews.Content: Started off great, but as weeks went by, there was less & I was able to watch.  Now I can only watch unlocked crap I don't want to see.  I don't blame the app or Amazon; I blame money-grubbing Xfinity.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: worth it for being free
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with this app because it does not have complete seasons. They jump from1,2,3 to9. I wish I could get my dvr recordings on this.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: cookgirl
Reviews.Content: Its good, not great. Volume control is limited. It stops/shuts down frequently. Restarting where you left off is not easy and often results in several minutes of ads ....and then you aren't in the place you selected and need to go thru another round of commercials. Not all the shows are available. You can't watch a show you missed earlier in the evening until the next day. But it is free and makes my kindle fire more interesting.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Awest0425
Reviews.Content: Works great, just like it says it will. Watch TV any place, any time. Sign in to your XFINITY account and you are up and running.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: Ol'  Geezeerrr
Reviews.Content: App is nice to have on my KindleFire HD...all I can say is a volume control would be nice.Installed and worked as advertised . .

Reviews.Title: xfinity don't go
Reviews.Author: Rigid
Reviews.Content: Too many errors and the live selection is sorely limited. Tried searching for several networks got a error. Tried to select live.. got an error

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It could be better if it didn't load when I wasn't home. On the house Internet it works better.  If I wanted to watch it at home I would use the cable box.

Reviews.Title: enjoying watching from my tablet
Reviews.Author: crackermama
Reviews.Content: So far I really dig this app. My only issue is sometimes the sound cuts out for a second or two. It doesn't make at break the shows for the most part. Well keep using this app. It's great when I'm not at home

Reviews.Title: Nice app
Reviews.Author: craftylady
Reviews.Content: I watch a lot of TV shows and movies with this app.  Easy to use.  Good app to have if your away from home

Reviews.Title: great app for traveling
Reviews.Author: James Bell
Reviews.Content: Love this app for watching movies and shows while on travel. Only issue is with the poor wireless reception in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: XFINITY TV Go
Reviews.Author: Julie York
Reviews.Content: I wasn't able to get into this app. I'm not sure if I have to pay a monthly fee for this app. You also need an ID to get into the app. I'm not sure what my ID is. I wish that I had a chance to try it out.

Reviews.Title: COOL APP
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: NICE ON THE GO TRAVEL APP!!  MANY  TV CHOICES OFFERED FOR VIEWING ON A  PHONE, TABLET OR COMPUTER ANYWHERE THERE IS A INTERNET CONNECTION.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Nichole22
Reviews.Content: I love being able to watch tv shows and movies while not at home! It makes me feel a little better about spending as much as we do for xfinity.

Reviews.Title: Great for Kindle Fire Hd tablet
Reviews.Author: Carrole Butts
Reviews.Content: Really didn't know about downloading this app from Xfinity TV GO after reading few of the reviews . But WORKS GREAT ON MY kindle fire hd. Also read reviews about the sound . The sound on my Kindle Fire Hd comes in loud and clear . Just downloaded it earlier so still going through the prime time shows . Watched devious maids on Life ch. I work nights so this app is great for me can't watch few programs I like so now I can watch when I'm not working and stay caught up. Will be looking through the movies and try that to.  All I can say is THANK YOU COMCAST for this app . Loving this app ! Perfect for me ! :)  GLADE you brought this to Amazon for Kindles . Thanks again !!!  For any body out there who has good internet connection and Comcast . Must download and try ! I'M NOT DISAPPOINTED SO FAR !!

Reviews.Title: Trinity TV Go really really rocks!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Gary F.
Reviews.Content: I have been using this application for several months now and it is great!!! I have a kindle fire HD that I use in conjunction with my mobile hotspot and everything works fantastic; I could not be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good but tons of commercials
Reviews.Author: Trisha Anderson
Reviews.Content: I love the app. it has more episodes to watch than on demand however you have a 3 min commercialbreak and then a glimpse of the next part of the show and then another 3.5 minute commercialbreak. so itsmorecommercials than On- Demand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent App
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Wright "hdphreak"
Reviews.Content: Works well and looks great on my Kindle Fire HD.  Doesn't have live TV but On Demand for network shows (for next day viewing) is good.  Of course it all depends on your package from Comcast.  Definite recommend.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity great
Reviews.Author: Vhesti
Reviews.Content: I gave a five star rating because I like xfinity Tv for myself and the kids. Great movies to pick from

Reviews.Title: Love this app!!!
Reviews.Author: bryan
Reviews.Content: I can watch orphan black in the tub!! :) smooth playback and great quality video plus convenience- I'm in love!

Reviews.Title: daily use its a must
Reviews.Author: Trish Riley
Reviews.Content: I love to bookmark my faves and just veg out and get caught up on my shows. Some times it's glitchy but xfinity peps always get me rock in and rolling again. Best around.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is
Reviews.Author: IronRider
Reviews.Content: This app was helpful back in the day when we had TV. Great for knowing when your favorit shows are on and want to learn about new upcoming shows and events. I found it informative. .

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Constance Neely
Reviews.Content: It is great to have this app.  It is great to review some of the shows and movies.  I know I will enjoy this app and it will be used often.

Reviews.Title: Love love love this app.
Reviews.Author: Ardelia Spencer
Reviews.Content: I love this app but just something's wrong with it can't see my soap's  an some of the best channels is not able to see please fix this an I well give it a five stars

Reviews.Title: email
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: I can't read my email from this app. I can't watch any movie without a subscription.You know what we have so that's what should pop up only

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: and
Reviews.Content: This app works great on my kindle. So far have been able to download multiple movies and watch tv on demand . I enjoy it

Reviews.Title: I love this app!!!

Reviews.Title: IT HAS NEVER COMPLETED ONE SHOW - VERY FRUSTRATING!
Reviews.Author: Kylie Paris "Honest  Critic"
Reviews.Content: I have tried twice to watch Xfinity on my Kindle HD and both times it just stopped in the middle of both one hour shows. Once the audio kept going but the picture froze (Bones) and the second  time (Castle) it  froze completely. I never got to see the end of either show.  A little message popped up informing me that Xfinity TV to go was not responding would I like to end it? Either way I wasted my time twice. I won't be fooled again. I trusted it because it rocks on my iPhone. I had no reason to believe it wouldn't be the same fantastic quality. But I have good reason now. How can they not know?  Wouldn't you think that they would routinely view their apps on all formats including the Kindle HD? Shouldn't that be a part someone's job? Apparently not.I have watched the TNT app, the ABC app, Amazon Prime television shows and movies all flawlessly.  Even CBS on kind of an Amazon Beta viewer. Everything except Xfinity works. It is unacceptable that I know there is a problem when apparently they don't know or they don't care.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity on my Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Content: I love watching TV while I am using the treadmill but we have no TV in the exercise room.  The problem is solved now that I discovered I can watch TV on my Kindle Fire using the app on my tablet.  I was watching Fox News while on the treadmill and image and sound was near perfect up until it was time for buffering.  There is a delay for buffering at times.  Other channels I may watch on the tablet are National Geographic and History.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV Go
Reviews.Author: Robert Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Works well with Comcast although one has to be careful when scrolling thru the channel guide or you will be accidentally changing channels.Great having channel guide, DVR manager, Movies and more on one screen.

Reviews.Title: works when it works
Reviews.Author: PWB
Reviews.Content: Not much good without video. Sound more than occasionally would be good too. Freezes when it is working. Disappointed. Had to add more just to submit. Uverse is starting to look good.

Reviews.Title: great app from xfinity
Reviews.Author: SHEWOLFNPA
Reviews.Content: I have found this application to be of great value to me being that I can't save all the showed that I like. I can watch most of then here and even started watching true blood o d series from season 1. Can also watch regular stations as well!!!

Reviews.Title: Great app for movies and shows
Reviews.Author: Capu
Reviews.Content: I love this app. I can watch my favorite shows right before bedtime in the comfort of my bed, and the best thing is if I don't finish it resumes where I left off

Reviews.Title: Nice to have on the road..
Reviews.Author: K. Meeks "Sleepless in...."
Reviews.Content: While visiting my son in AZ it was nice to be able to use the on demand while on the road.  He doesn't have television and with xfinety I don't have to miss my favorite shows.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this app!!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Cusher
Reviews.Content: I have had zero problems with this app, I couldn't live without it. I'm a Bravo-holic with three kids and a job. When I'm not working, I`m incapable of staying in one place for too long so my kindle and xfinity app make my day to day tv watching so much easier! Love love love!!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Nan Cairo "Nan Cairo"
Reviews.Content: Because I am staying at with my mom who sleeps in the living room, I am able to watch shows on my kindle using this app.  No it is not like watching a big screen, but I get to watch my shows without waiting weeks when I go home. I love it. Great when you can't watch a tv.

Reviews.Title: commercial
Reviews.Author: unc 23
Reviews.Content: Was this a show or just a run of commercials? Kept freezing up (using xfinity WiFi) & the commercials were longer than the actual show time. Back to Netflix it is.

Reviews.Title: xfinity go
Reviews.Author: trini girl
Reviews.Content: simply love this feature on my tablet will continue to use this feature. and discover more stuff i can see. this works well if you have missed your favorite program & catching up at a later date.

Reviews.Title: great app but sometimes a little laggie
Reviews.Author: frank mcveigh
Reviews.Content: Love that I can watch all my favorite shows and movies on the go but it tends to lag out and can't watch it but all in all great app

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Emileigh
Reviews.Content: I have this on many devices - and this is a very big improvement over anything comcast had before.  Get it!

Reviews.Title: Allows me to catch up!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The app worked nicely for me on my Kindle and other devices. I can catch missed episodes of favorite programs easily.

Reviews.Title: Neat Tool to use
Reviews.Author: Dimplesdelight
Reviews.Content: This was a neat idea and I like to download movies, just wish they would add more tv shows to the list of downloads. That would have been great to catch up on shows during my flight.

Reviews.Title: great app but keeps freezing
Reviews.Author: Erica Lowe
Reviews.Content: Since lately, this app has been freezing more than usual and desired. I can barely get through one hour without it freezing at least 4 times. Please fix this bug for a better user experience.

Reviews.Title: Great App!!
Reviews.Author: Edna Ponder
Reviews.Content: Xfinity TV Go is really fantastic for me.  I like  the movies and shows they play.  When I'm out waiting on doctors appts or traveling ~ Xfinity TV Go occupy my time. I really love it.

Reviews.Title: awesome app
Reviews.Author: Cilla Gruber
Reviews.Content: Works great on my kindle fire. Sometimes plays the same commercial twice, but all in all a reliable app. Try it!

Reviews.Title: works well even with a less than ideal network connection
Reviews.Author: Joseph Selden
Reviews.Content: I was able to watch full programs with only two bars with no buffering. Worms better than Netflix and hbo go.

Reviews.Title: only works about half the time
Reviews.Author: Diane "Diane"
Reviews.Content: Either shows a "problem with playlist" error message or freezes so often it's hardly worth the trouble.  I don't have this trouble with Netflix or other video streaming, so I know it's not my wireless connection.

Reviews.Title: needs volume button
Reviews.Author: Noire Pense
Reviews.Content: Great so. Shows very clear. Easy to use. BUT desperately need volume button. Whomever created this couldn't be a kindle user because there is no external volume button. The application needs one built in.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV Go
Reviews.Author: Chrisonly
Reviews.Content: Upgrade was good. This app is stabile and brings your webmail to your tablet. Very convenient and organized well. Recommended to download.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: fun. fun. fun.
Reviews.Content: I love the app when I can't get to my DVR to watch some of my recordings I use it to catch up. Just one complaint no CW to watch . But other wise great app.

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: Manuel Cardenas Jr.
Reviews.Content: A GREAT app that is a perfect companion for my Xfinity service. I LOVE IT!I never have to wait too as my favorite shows

Reviews.Title: A favorite app, no problems for me
Reviews.Author: Kristi Gilleland
Reviews.Content: Very nice.  I wish they'd get a ROKU app too, so I can use it on a Roku projector.The app has worked very well for me with no problems at all.  I am able to watch some of my shows a bit quicker than they post on ON DEMAND I noticed.  I've used it on my HTC 1x and also my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Won't play anything
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Shult
Reviews.Content: I have tried several different videos to watch and I keep getting an error message that it is having a problem and try again later. I've tried it over several days and even tried uninstalling and reinstalling. It does not want to work for me for some reason. I have kindle fire HDX and I do have a comcast account. I'm able to log in so what's up?

Reviews.Title: Must download
Reviews.Author: Ky'mire  barksdale
Reviews.Content: This was the best thing for my Kindle.....never miss a show can watch anytime and any place....love it!!!!!! This is a must have app!!!!!

Reviews.Title: good with limited content
Reviews.Author: MBear
Reviews.Content: The xfinity app is good but not great it has quite a few limitations.  As mentioned by others the volume is very low even with head phones and using external speakers only makes it slightly more of normal  volume level but not really loud so if your hard of hearing or are you are multitasking you may not really hear much.  The player also has a lot of programming limitations and what makes this more annoying is the home page lists must watch shows that are not available in the app...that's just stupid.  Now you have to use a multitude of apps to be able to watch your cable programming, ie abc & abc family apps, lifetime app, amc app, etc... i was hoping for a only stop shop without paying for another service like hulu+.  I also travel often and was hoping i could connect the kindle to the hotel tv to watch the content but xfinity does not allow that either.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Murphy
Reviews.Content: Hooked on the Food Network. Can watch it anytime, anywhere. Really like this app as another access to xfinity TV.

Reviews.Title: slow running
Reviews.Author: Alexander  Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: If you can keep running ads and play tv show  would be a good app and crisis epd 2 won't work

Reviews.Title: Really like this app
Reviews.Author: Sharon N. Hoover "proud christian"
Reviews.Content: I really like having this app.  I can watch shows on my tablet, that I have missed or want to see again

Reviews.Title: TV any time
Reviews.Author: Jarrod
Reviews.Content: Go to Comcast get a users name and password and watch TV, any Time. I'm watching OZ from HBO. This went off the air years ago but this app still shows it. LOVE IT

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Dan O'Conor
Reviews.Content: As the title says it works. Installs and delivers content. Easy enough to find what one may be looking for. And playback quality is more than adequate.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Marcy Steindler
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound were both great. Lots of good choices to watch.  It's a good way to watch when there is no tv around.

Reviews.Title: more live channels
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Few live options. When it works its great minus commercials every 5-7 minutes. Was really hoping for a lot more. I pay xfinity. You advertise xfinity. Give me xfinity

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Coco
Reviews.Content: It works really good. You just have to see if it needs updates for you can watch the videos. But it works really good

Reviews.Title: fun on the go
Reviews.Author: pocophynix
Reviews.Content: Clear picture and sound, awesome to be able to watch shows on the go. Downloads need to be a larger list.

Reviews.Title: Only accessible to Comcast users
Reviews.Author: Joni Gillispie
Reviews.Content: I had to delete this as I am a DISH user and was not able to use this app on my phone.

Reviews.Title: Works well by trial and error.
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL BALDWIN
Reviews.Content: It is useful but not user friendly and intuitive which is a problem with most Xfinity software I have encountered.

Reviews.Title: only one big concern
Reviews.Author: Jennifer J. Scott
Reviews.Content: This app. Would be great if it didn't freeze up all the time! I have to shut down my kindle every time it freezes. It's very annoying!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Marcia V.
Reviews.Content: This works great for catching up on current season episodes without commercials. It occasionally has some halting video. Overall good.

Reviews.Title: My husband and kids love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tiajuana N Gaines
Reviews.Content: I would give it 5 stars but my husband and children stay on it! They love this app! I love it too when I have a chance to use it! It has old shows/movies and new ones. No buffering throughout it. You can download shows so that when you're on the go you can watch your favorites! I give it 5STARS!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Needs work
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Other TV streaming apps work perfectly fine on my tablet. This one loses sync between the audio and video. Pretty annoying.

Reviews.Title: works well
Reviews.Author: MGW
Reviews.Content: I have to re install once In a while but works well overall.  There is really no other option for this service.

Reviews.Title: Good but...
Reviews.Author: Meghan C
Reviews.Content: I like the app and how many free tv shows and movies are available but the app freezes a lot and crashes.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice! Good Job Comcast
Reviews.Author: L. Wyatt
Reviews.Content: It works very well for me on Android, Apple IOS, Windows, etc. I'm using on IPad Mini, Nexus 7, Kindle Fire HD 8.9, and Windows computers.My only issue is I wish there was an APP for the first gen Kindle Fire to change and view channels, but it doesn't work on Android 2.3 so the only option is to use the website DVR manager.

Reviews.Title: it's ok I guess
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: Been watching shameless on a kindle fire. Got past season 2 & started season 3 episode 1 just fine.  When I got back on to watch season 3 episode 2, it wasn't there. When I tried to see if the rest of the episodes were there, they weren't, but some of season 4 was. All the previous seasons & episodes I already watched were all jumbled up & some were missing. I have to uninstall & reinstall this app every single time I want to watch this show.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: eddevor
Reviews.Content: Is a life saver when kids take over all the television sets and the house is awash in the stupidity that is known as cartoons today.

Reviews.Title: nice app
Reviews.Author: Tricia
Reviews.Content: I like this app but wish I didn't have to be near my WiFi to use it. Other wise it's nice to use to watch shows that I missed during the week.

Reviews.Title: you'll love it
Reviews.Author: Shanda Stewart
Reviews.Content: It's great just give it a try and you'll love it, the selection is always growing and you get your shows

Reviews.Title: TV Go rocks.....
Reviews.Author: David Ryder
Reviews.Content: With three Kids and only 2 tv's in the house, TV Go has saved me. Thanks Xfinity!No more waiting for Dora and the real housewives of Schenectady to before it's my turn to watch.

Reviews.Title: Super Annoying
Reviews.Author: Timothy Powell
Reviews.Content: 3 plus minute long commercials, I might as well watch regular tv. At least that way I don't have to watch the same 3 commercials over and over again. As if the price of cable wasn't enough.

Reviews.Title: app doesn't work for kindle fire
Reviews.Author: John W. Gregory
Reviews.Content: why is the app available for kindle fire when it doesn't work? Which app does work for my Kindle Fire? I would love to use this but can't.

Reviews.Title: No Go
Reviews.Author: Patricia Parks
Reviews.Content: I tried to download this app as I am an existing Xfinity customer, however, it is not compatible with my all-in-one android computer.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great app.
Reviews.Author: P. Rakes
Reviews.Content: The sound is good, hd is good. Works wonderfully on my kindle fire hd to catch up on missed shows. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Bah
Reviews.Author: c brenner
Reviews.Content: No streaming of real time shows on kindle so I am going to be sending it back at least I can get it on ipad

Reviews.Title: Enjoying tv on the go
Reviews.Author: C. Egan
Reviews.Content: Shows streamed seamlessly and picture & sound were excellent.  Very easy to navigate the site and tv shows are up to date.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity
Reviews.Author: Ernesto Castillo
Reviews.Content: This app is great! I would recommend this for every person out there. So if you have Xfinity, You should download this app.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Deedee Heyne
Reviews.Content: I love being ableTo catch up on my shows anytime.  I've always been happy with Comcast Xfinity and now even more so.  THANKS!

Reviews.Title: great way to watch the news anywhere
Reviews.Author: M. Evans "New England Technology Teacher of T...
Reviews.Content: A terrific way to keep up with series and also live tv. A+Works as it should on kindle fire and my Samsung phone.

Reviews.Title: Finally ...
Reviews.Author: Santino S
Reviews.Content: My one gripe is (or was) that I couldn't watch Xfinity from my Kindle on my TV through HDMI and now that`s been fixed.

Reviews.Title: With WiFi Works Great
Reviews.Author: Katy Beth
Reviews.Content: When I have WiFi available this gives me even more viewing options while on the good.  A great perk for my Comcast account.

Reviews.Title: Does the job well
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Runyan
Reviews.Content: Nice layout. Easy navigation. Pretty good addition to any Xfinity subscriber's app collection. The app seems a bit reluctant to let you exit, however. Returning to the home screen of the Kindle requires a bit of fancy quick-step clicking. The streaming is among the best I've come across, so it's a pretty fair trade-off.

Reviews.Title: love this app
Reviews.Author: Carol Cipollo
Reviews.Content: Needs more past episodes available for certain shows..otherwise it's an exceptionally great way to watch tv on the go. It's a must app for your Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: Taking my cable tv with me...
Reviews.Author: S Liegl
Reviews.Content: For the price of cable these days, I'm glad Comcast has this app as a perk. Not sure what previous reviewer was talking about, because this app does play a lot of the current episodes. The day after they air, they pop right up on the main page. Since I sometimes work nights and do not have DVR, this app is awesome. Additionally, there are a few movies available for download to take with you. And the search function is such that you can easily see the download options.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: mikaelahumala
Reviews.Content: It's really good and I like it a lot. It works just sometimes it has to buffer to get really good picture and quality

Reviews.Title: volume too low and needs quick rewind button
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Myers
Reviews.Content: Volume is toolow even on highest setting. Needs easier playback controls such as a 10 second rewind button. Otherwise enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: It works great for me :)
Reviews.Author: Michael Gignac
Reviews.Content: I just started using this app and I am very pleased with it so far. As long as I have a good WiFi signal, the programs download quickly and easily. I haven't had any problems with the volume using just the kindle's speakers.

Reviews.Title: new
Reviews.Author: Tia
Reviews.Content: I just started using this app but so far it seems decent. With my busy schedule it may save some DVR space by watching shows as I'm on the go.

Reviews.Title: glad this is available.
Reviews.Author: harleychik0117
Reviews.Content: My kids have overrun my tv with the Xbox and I had lost out on my shows but with this app I now have my shows back. Thank you gratefully.

Reviews.Title: Tv on the the fly love the flexibility.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer santajim
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at how much TV transmissions have been improved and miniaturized. With smaller components and higher qualities of sound and picture. What is next?

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: There are no design flaws in the app and there are great shows and movies that you can watch for free but to watch all the greatest and best, there is yet another subscription on top of the others you need for this app to work which is something easily overlooked.

Reviews.Title: Works as Expected
Reviews.Author: Squishy
Reviews.Content: It would be nice to be able to watch live TV, but otherwise it's a nice alternative to a DVR.

Reviews.Title: Great app!
Reviews.Author: SuperGlide
Reviews.Content: Works great....handy app. Used it the most when we had to disconnect the tvs for new carpeting.  Downloading on all our portable electronics.

Reviews.Title: Buffering
Reviews.Author: Amelia
Reviews.Content: How do you make this app stop buffering every 2 mins or so. It is very annoying!!! I have uninstalled and reknstalled the app hoping it would fix the problem with no luck. Help.

Reviews.Title: Works Well
Reviews.Author: NAP "ElderGeek"
Reviews.Content: .....even though you don't have the number of choices or movies that Netflix offers, it works very well and is very clear.

Reviews.Title: keeps crashing
Reviews.Author: kiwi
Reviews.Content: Have deleted this app and reloaded multiple times as it keeps crashing. Locking up playing audio with no picture ,saying "seeking". When it works its few as t to be able to on demand watch shows but the glitches make for frustrating viewing

Reviews.Title: Not bad but needs work
Reviews.Author: John Aseff "jaseff"
Reviews.Content: I have an Xfinity app on my Windosw phone that includes a remote keypad that y o u can use to change channels on your TV. It would be nice if this app had it too.

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: rene' weeks
Reviews.Content: My other half is a horrible surfer. I used to vcr all my faves but can't do that anymore:( Dvr isn't portable so xfinity is the alternative. Between xfinity and Hulu plus, I can watch most of my faves during lunch at work. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Too many commercials
Reviews.Author: IRENE KELLY
Reviews.Content: This app shouldn't play commercials, there's enough on cable TV.  Remove them from here and this app will be better.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Yemisi Hester
Reviews.Content: My family loves watching shows on the go and the Xfinity TV Go is the best app for it !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Linda Abbott
Reviews.Content: My favorite shows always seem to run during my busiest times.  I canwatch/listen on the run rather than loading up my DVR and then trying to find time to watch all of them!

Reviews.Title: Worked as good as always
Reviews.Author: Jannette Hadley
Reviews.Content: I have used this app on other devices - worked just as well as it does on all other devices.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity tV Go
Reviews.Author: Richard Chattaway
Reviews.Content: Great app to able to watch show on my kindle or phone have enjoyed many of my favorite programs this way

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Scott L. Sikorski
Reviews.Content: Haven't had any problems using Xfinity TV Go except that there are so many movies and shows it can take awhile to find something specific:)

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV is great.
Reviews.Author: Jonienne Hazel
Reviews.Content: I chose this because I am away from home a lot and don't get to see my favorite shows.  This way I can use my phone.

Reviews.Title: Good but could be better
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: Good experience. It's great that now you can see your favorite Tv shows any time anywhere. If some of the features Amazon video and Netflix have would be on this app, the app would go from good to excellent.

Reviews.Title: Works well, except live stream
Reviews.Author: Brittany Mienko
Reviews.Content: Live streaming is a joke on the kindle fire hd. Other wise everything else seems to work very well. Navigation is easy with the filter options provided and I haven't experienced any problems with the volume.

Reviews.Title: pretty good, has some issues, use the download a lot, but  choices are limited then.
Reviews.Author: Dorothy
Reviews.Content: Works smoothly. Works best with headphones. Does not recognize my phone's hotspot as a wireless internet. Use it often. Use  Netflix more frequently because of the hotspot issue. Device is kindle fire HD. It's the only tv/movie/app that does not recognize my hotspot as wireless, so I either download or use a different app. Also does not recognize my offices phone company wireless  internet and tells me to login to an internet connection. Seems to work fine on any comcast connection, no matter how weak. Proprietary lockdown maybe? Downloads mostly limited to old movies with very little television series available for download. Definitely my first choice for downloads and last choice for internet viewing.

Reviews.Title: Thank You XFinity!
Reviews.Author: D. Davis
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best app I have.  If you're a subscriber, you can watch literally hundreds of programs, TV series, and movies. For newer movies, there is a small fee, but there's enough to watch without paying a penny. I don't know how often new shows are added and I wish Investigation Discovery was one of the networks that was included, but other than that, I love this app. It was also great to have when traveling as you can download and watch later.

Reviews.Title: XFINITYY TO GO
Reviews.Author: Beverley J. "Kali"
Reviews.Content: Had a lot trouble getting connected. now i would to get my kindle Fire connected but can't seem to do it. HELP!BevJ6

Reviews.Title: Sound issue
Reviews.Author: Joan Burkhardt
Reviews.Content: After downloading the app I was wondering why there was no sound. So I tried using ear buds.  This is the only way I can hear anything.  Otherwise, there is no sound.

Reviews.Title: continually buffers
Reviews.Author: jaguil
Reviews.Content: At first I enjoyed the app, now every show buffers multiple times till I give up and go back to Netflix( old reliable). The app rarely works and needs improvement.

Reviews.Title: why this app is not showing picture s
Reviews.Author: Tyrus mckinnis
Reviews.Content: I LIKE this app it works for my viewing options please contact me because it's not working properly. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good App
Reviews.Author: Andrea Johnson
Reviews.Content: Only thing keeping this app from getting 5 stars is that it lacks some of the channels I pay for in my Xfinity account.

Reviews.Title: One of the worst apps I've ever used in Kindle
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: This app is extremely limited and really really sucks, all of it. Menus, browsing, etc. I just stopped using it.

Reviews.Title: Great ap
Reviews.Author: Karen Mack
Reviews.Content: Cable went out during a recent ice storm. Thank goodness for on demand on mobile hotspot. Was able to watch tv and a lot of movies on our kindles.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kee
Reviews.Content: I generally don't watch shows in real-time and I pay for cable(:-/ . This app comes in handy for the kindle hd.

Reviews.Title: Such an amazing app!!!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Ellis
Reviews.Content: Thank you truly for developing such an amazing app, that is not only simple to use but very well put together for ease of use! Most of all I can't thank you enough for making an app that makes watching my absolute favorite shows on my android while I'm at work for 12 hours at a time,(Paramedic) but for also making it free!!!! You are absolutely genius!!! XOXO

Reviews.Title: To go is cool
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I find more quality shows using the Xfinity app than with Netflix.  The only drawback is Netflix allows streaming videos (I use Google Chrome) while Xfinity doesn't.

Reviews.Title: What happened?
Reviews.Author: Frederick L. Huston, Jr.
Reviews.Content: I was really liking this app as I could watch ALL episodes of many of my favorite shows. However, while watching sequential episodes of "The Office", I was suddenly kicked to a point where I can only watch a few, nonsequential episodes which appear to be TBS based. Should be no surprise as the obvious goal of NBC/Comcast  is to crush the competition, raise rates, and reduce services. Viva la Wal-Mart!

Reviews.Title: not bad.
Reviews.Author: J. Blodgett
Reviews.Content: It's not a bad little app. I have seen worse. A lot worse. I do like the ability to download the show or movie when you have service and then watch it on the road.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound, no choices
Reviews.Author: Meghan M.
Reviews.Content: I have had this app for a few years now.  The sound being extremely low has been my only complaint until recently. Within the last few weeks, xfinity has removed several networks, numerous shows, and almost every movie. The choices are so few recently that it is not even worth opening the app.

Reviews.Title: Best way to download movies for offline viewing
Reviews.Author: Lucy Bristol
Reviews.Content: Finding a movie is a bit tiresome unless you know the specific movie. However, the download process was easy and fast. I like that I was able to save it to my SD card. Good product even if the search is cumbersome.

Reviews.Title: this is a wonderful app
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "tde"
Reviews.Content: a great opportunity to find movies on my android devices. I especially like having the opportunity to find special movies that I have seen before and want to see again.

Reviews.Title: not working
Reviews.Author: Chris henley
Reviews.Content: Errors each time trying to watch. Says need peer certificate. Too many bugs. If you get a show to load, it buffers every 10 seconds.

Reviews.Title: I like this app
Reviews.Author: Bart Langly
Reviews.Content: it took a while but I finally found a cable-television application – the works I had  about given up , but things

Reviews.Title: love it, even with minor problems
Reviews.Author: Cortney Bonney
Reviews.Content: Basically, I moved out of my mom's house and now I was suffering without her Comcast. This app lets me catch up with most my favorite show.Now my only problems, yes it does take a little time (pauses) to load during anything your watching. It's best to use while you've got good wifi.Also, MTV and VH1 are no longer on this app. They're available on xfinity website but not on the app no more, I hate that.Otherwise you can download to watch later, and for me most shows are available day after airing.

Reviews.Title: shows have a 2 week lagtime
Reviews.Author: Not what I thought
Reviews.Content: I am not happy with App. I Can log into m infinity acct and view and view shows the day after they air. On this app there is a two week 'lag to watch a show if I am even able to access at all.

Reviews.Title: Most useful app on my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Troy Hebert
Reviews.Content: Wasn't really sure what to expect; but with the X-1 package, this app is the most useful app currently installed on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Les236
Reviews.Content: I have been using this app for about 6 months. I travel a lot so it is great. Some movies and shows are downloadable for offline use which is great too for flying. I use it at least 4 times each week and it is also great for when I miss an episode, although not everything is there. I always have a decent wireless connection so never have issues. I use it on my Kindle Fire HD and Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: fast internet required
Reviews.Author: Patricia Gac
Reviews.Content: Somewhat difficult to set up, but worth it to catch up when on the go and have a strong internet connection..

Reviews.Title: Limited streaming options, no live local channels, usage limits
Reviews.Author: John Traynor
Reviews.Content: Not a bad app, quality of streaming is very good. Unfortunately popular broadcast networks are not available for live streaming. Some network shows are available for streaming after broadcast, but it's hit-and-miss. Comcast should rework its retransmission agreements with the providers. For the price of my monthly subscription, why should it matter if I use a tethered box in my home or my Kindle? And why limit use to not even three users total but three devices total? If everyone in my family has a Kindle, why can only half of them use this Comcast app?Another reviewer mentioned there is no volume control; there is but by default it is hidden. Check the settings panel; both volume and brightness control can be exposed.

Reviews.Title: TV on the Go

Reviews.Title: I'm enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: works fine

Reviews.Title: Favorite!

Reviews.Title: XFINITY ON THE GO

Reviews.Title: catch up

Reviews.Title: excellent

I mean, it seems that MTV decided to opt out of this app all together. (This doesn't help when I want to catch up on Awkward, Teen Wolf, or any of the other sources of drama that I love so much. Guess it is the Netflix app for those shows.) I probably will only use this app to watch BBC America while I am away at college. I mean, I can only go without Doctor Who and Top Gear for so long.

Reviews.Title: Must have in my book.
Reviews.Author: Bonham
Reviews.Content: If you have Comcast and a smart device (large phone, tablet, ipad, laptop) you should have this.  Basically it does everything your TV service can at home minus watch what is saved on your DVR.You have access to your accounts Video On Demand and standard live programming and you can program your DVR.  My wife was in the hospital for a week once so we brought her Mac (laptop) to watch TV with.  At work (or halfway around the world but have an internet connection) and want to program a show to record on your DVR?  No problem.  This'll do it.  I will not, however, let you watch what is recorded on your DVR (although that isn't far down the road - once the DVR function is 'in the cloud' this will be possible too).

Reviews.Title: don't confuse this with being able to watch like on tv

Experimental streaming didn't work either.  Doesn't make sense to me since this app is suppose to work for Kindle HD.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy what I am able to watch

Reviews.Title: Doesn't have all shows available on site!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Since the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9 does not support Flash and so does not support playing shows on the Xfinity site (it currently requires Flash version 11.8 or higher), I was excited to see there was an Xfinity app available to watch shows on my Kindle. However, not all of the shows that are available to watch online or On Demand are available to watch on the app. I searched for several and none that I wanted to watch were available even though I can play them on Xfinity's website. It would be great if the app could include at least all shows available on the web or that Kindle would support Flash on its browsers.The few shows that I did check out on the app worked well and looked great. The selection of shows however makes the rating of this app drop immensly since that's the point of its use.

Reviews.Title: It's Ok
