Reviews.Title: love love love!!
Reviews.Author: Nellie
Reviews.Content: Don't know what I would do without this app!! The fam doesn't watch the same shows I do, so when the kids and the man have video game time, I get to catch up on my shows :0)

Reviews.Title: easy to use and I can watch tv while I work
Reviews.Author: my daughter and I have a great time growing m...
Reviews.Content: I like this app.  It is easy to use.  I can watch it using my kindle where ever I am in the house.  I like the flexibility.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: M. Woodbury "Gotta have books"
Reviews.Content: I like the app and find it easier to use than the PC version. Give it a try, you will like it.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for putting xfinity in my kindle
Reviews.Author: Diane Ramos
Reviews.Content: Love it they are great.  I am a customer of xfinity. Love that I could my favorites series away from home so I won't miss anything thanks kindle love it

Reviews.Title: Xfinity TV GO
Reviews.Author: David Dubay
Reviews.Content: Excellent tool for Comcast usersExcellent tool for Kindle Fire HDhighly recommend this app for othersThanks for offering Amazon

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Ken "Ken"
Reviews.Content: I love it. When I found it I couldn't even believe that it would really be what it claimed. I now have access to way too much tv.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity Rocks!
Reviews.Author: Mama Kat
Reviews.Content: I have been asked by so many other companies to switch my service...no way! Besides being a loyal customer, I love the high speed and the options available.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ashley m. Rudman
Reviews.Content: It is so useful and reliable ! It's filled with a big variaty of movie selection! It also catches me up on my episodes I missed !!

Reviews.Title: no live tv
Reviews.Author: M. Potter
Reviews.Content: I wanted this so I could watch tv while I am in the kitchen. Once I downloaded the app and selected a tv station to watch tvit said I needed Adobe flash to watch. Tried to download Adobe flash and can't. What's up with that??  Unable to do what it says it can do for me.

Reviews.Title: One MAJOR problem
Reviews.Author: Fantasy/ adventure lover
Reviews.Content: You need an account that you have to pay for. What the heck???!!! That's not fair I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Favorites at my fingertips
Reviews.Author: Teresa T.
Reviews.Content: The Xfinity TV app makes it easy for me to catch up on my favorite shows from bed, haha. There are some features that I think would be interesting to see in the app, but I have enjoyed my experience with it very much so far.

Reviews.Title: I was just in the mood  ..
Reviews.Author: Robin L. Taylor
Reviews.Content: ...for The Neverending Story. Found this App and  the movie. Couldn't be happier. I'm certain to find others with ease.

Reviews.Title: Comcast
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Comcast does not work and you cannot get anyone to help on phone or in home. Pay a lot of money for account and wireless connection is very bad.

Reviews.Title: Allows to get on the Comcast network
Reviews.Author: William Denninger
Reviews.Content: it works as advertised. Not like to "free" games it works. I would recommend it if you are a Comcast member.

Reviews.Title: WHEN
Reviews.Author: Tim Jackson
Reviews.Content: Great app! Keeps all of my TV shows in line when I am busy. Works great on Kindle Fire. I really like the bookmark feature.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Sarah Gerard
Reviews.Content: The picture is so clear on the HDX and the app works so well I may not need a tv anymore!

Reviews.Title: great app
Reviews.Author: great app needs more modern movies for basic ...
Reviews.Content: Good appNeeds more movies for basic people with basic cable not many live shows available either other than that it's good food HD videos fast streaming

Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Bigflyrodder
Reviews.Content: This app/player works as advertised and often gives me a better picture with fewer jitters than when playing on my laptop.  Overall very good.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Eric Lee
Reviews.Content: Great app! Everyone should have this. Get all of your television shows right here. If you have a premium channel like HBO or Starz and want to watch the entire series you can watch them with this app.

Reviews.Title: first use!
Reviews.Author: Jason Michael Carder
Reviews.Content: From the first I used this app it has a very wide selection of options available very well satisfied and I'm very choosy when it comes to what I want watch

Reviews.Title: AWSOME!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Santana Burnside
Reviews.Content: This app is the best there is almost all l the shows you can think of I even got to watch all three reunions of bad girls club and they were full episodes and free I would recommend this app the world's best app :-)

Reviews.Title: Great app
Reviews.Author: Lisa Stewart
Reviews.Content: Like it to watch videos from my on-demand account on Comcast.  Its fast and has more movies then regular On-Demand does.

Reviews.Title: xfinity tv
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Miller
Reviews.Content: Won't connect when I put in my password and it's the right password, so I have no use for it.

Reviews.Title: what's not to like
Reviews.Author: Tracy R. Mayer
Reviews.Content: Can watch tv anywhere.  Works great.  Lots of choices.  Just need a connection to the  internet and you are good to go.

Reviews.Title: limited selection, poor functionality on Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: SteveK
Reviews.Content: Poor selection of movies & shows.  On HDX when I was watching video & wanted to exit &  Brought up the "home button" it would immediately disappear making it almost impossible to exit the video.  Very lousy app,  poorly tested on HDX.  Avoid.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Rhonda G Miller
Reviews.Content: Wow best app ive ever seen good screen doesnt take for ever to load and live tv on any channel something I would definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture great sound on my kindle fire he. Absolutely love that I can watch anywhere I want the convenience to watch on my schedule. Thanks for giving me a little more bang for my buck.

Reviews.Title: Better than the original Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Squanda
Reviews.Content: My first Kindle Fire had volume, but not like the HD. Happy to use headphones to hear movies or tv. Just need volume control on the app for tv and movies.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: michael dorroh
Reviews.Content: Terrible channel lineups. Many channels I don't like pr want and many I want but can't get. Bad bad nad.

Reviews.Title: It's okay.
Reviews.Author: Jake Lester
Reviews.Content: I don't seem to have access to a lot of the stations that I would want to watch/stream live. It's fun to be able to take it on the go, but bothers me that I am relegated to watching only a select number of stations live.

Reviews.Title: Love Movies to Go
Reviews.Author: Sandy Penny "WritingMuse"
Reviews.Content: I love that I'm able to watch movies on the go if I choose to. This app makes it easy to access my account on my kindle, and that's just wonderful for me. Works great, although it does not have the choice of streaming speed setting. I like to use lower streaming speeds to conserve my battery and speed up the streaming process. Still, I'm happy to have this app and recommend it if you want to stream xfinity on your android device.

Reviews.Title: free and good
Reviews.Author: M. M. Wright "mimawright"
Reviews.Content: I use this app slot to catch up on shows I missed. True, it lacks volume control, which is annoying. But I do love the convenience of watching shows I have missed without having to go to the tv room. Not great for live tv -- just 3 network channels.

Reviews.Title: smiles
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Bachar
Reviews.Content: Why pay for hulu or Netflix after paying for cable your not home to view, or forgot to DVR? This app has never disappointed our family! Thanks for every entertaining moment, xfinity you're awesome!

Reviews.Title: No good it should be pulled it is no good
Reviews.Author: George Pogan
Reviews.Content: Waste of time it is no good should be taken off so no one else wastes their time What a shame

Reviews.Title: better on my laptop than my kindle
Reviews.Author: ursel
Reviews.Content: First time I used it, it got hung up on commercials......haven't tried it since. Does not seem like the laptop version at all and offered my very old episodes instead of the newest ones first.

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: sadie
Reviews.Content: I liked almost everything about this app except you can't get all the station's or shows. There are a lot of shows/movies. Just a warning that you may not find everything you are looking for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Dale A. Francisco "DakineAthon"
Reviews.Content: With this app I can view my Comcast content from anywhere I can get access to the Internet, if I can see it at home on the TV I can view it while away from home, how cool is that?

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Marlene Pettit
Reviews.Content: I really like it. I have only had it a few days and I find it lots of fun to have.

Reviews.Title: bad app
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This app is horrible and every time I try to watch a show it is always freeze up and is always loading which take forever.

Reviews.Title: This app does support live streaming
Reviews.Author: David J. George
Reviews.Content: Contrary to several former reviews this app does support live streaming, just used it to stream British Premier League live on NBC Sports. The older version did not support this and I had to update the app but it now works just fine.Navigation in the app could be improved and some error messages are misleading but overall the quality is good.

Reviews.Title: could be a good app if they improve performance
Reviews.Author: Jennifer L. McCleary
Reviews.Content: The selection of programming is impressive but playback is pretty rough. My connection speeds are just fine and Netflix works like a charm. The Xfinity playback is pretty poor unless u download the entire program (if they allow you to) before watching. Buffering issues throughout entire playback. Checked speeds and did some comparison between apps and found this one still needs some work. Hope they work out the issues because it could be a very good application.

Reviews.Title: Great App!
Reviews.Author: Eav
Reviews.Content: This app is quite efficient and it does a good job of letting  you watch stuff without any hassle. It functions quite well. On the minus side, there must be a better a way to sort through shows especially alphabetically. And, it would be nice if the seasons and shows in the pop up were sorted in an ascending order as well. Otherwise, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity on Comcast !
Reviews.Author: John J. Salafia
Reviews.Content: Some apps work fine, some not so good, some...not at all ! This app (for Me) works Fine. Ba-Da-Bing !!!

Reviews.Title: it's cool
Reviews.Author: d. goodman
Reviews.Content: It works fine o my kindle. I work nights  and this is one of my saving graces.  Good shows , good times.

Reviews.Title: Xfinity Go
Reviews.Author: NativeSun
Reviews.Content: Words cannot describe how awesome this app is but I'll give it a try. In my opinion it's better than Netflix, seriously. With this app not only can you watch hit television shows and movies when you want.... you can download them as well. Where they do that at??? Not on Netflix. Download this app now and take cable tv with you everywhere you go!

Reviews.Title: Works fine on Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Stanley R. Ray
Reviews.Content: Tried this out using Wi-Fi and everything worked as intended.  Volume on the HDX was more than adequate in a quiet room and my 65 YO hearing.

Reviews.Title: good enough
Reviews.Author: Eloise Lepesqueur
Reviews.Content: This app has enough of the features that you want (movies, tv shows) but issues like it not syncing well with the web version (does available via web aren't always on the mobile app) being down the star rating.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: Gabby
Reviews.Content: Good quality but choppy buffering, it will play a video w ell and then occasionally it will randomly skip forward a few seconds.

Reviews.Title: xfinity tv go
Reviews.Author: Jacob E. Du Toit "Evert"
Reviews.Content: Being able to watch the penguins while being on the road, what more could I ask for? Thanks for great app.

Reviews.Title: "xfinity" now works on Kindle
Reviews.Author: HAROLD
Reviews.Content: It now works as advertized !!! I could not get it to work on four Kindle's and after two weeks of frustration I called Amazon Kindle and Comcast support--Amazon Kindle tech gave me a few things to try but to no avail and suggested calling Comcast--I then spoke with Comcast and their tech attempted to get it to work on his phone and had the same problem that I had been having-- PROBLEM:  Continually buffering-- A Case Number was assigned ,RT KZNUQ7TT6, and in less than an hour all was up and running--Thank You Comcast and Amazon for helping to correct this problem--

Reviews.Title: impressive
Reviews.Author: Flint
Reviews.Content: Overall good value.  I was disappointed same season episodes where not available.  For example SOA begins with episode 6 making it impossible to start the season.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Aladdin Dale "Jeanie"
Reviews.Content: It allowed me to watch Kelly Clarkson's new Christmas music special! That was awesome!! I do wish the major networks live programming was on this-not mostly just news networks. That is a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: kind of almost useless
Reviews.Author: Mr. Smee
Reviews.Content: There are tons of shows advertised  that they say you may watch on demand but that's only if you are already a subscriber to each of the individual premium networks. I would like it better if it was tailored to what the individual subscriber was actually able to watch instead of showing you what your missing out on by not blowing ALL your disposable income on cable service.But I guess that would defeat the purpose of their app now wouldn't it?

Reviews.Title: SUPER-FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Glenda Todd
Reviews.Content: I can watch the shows that I missed and movies as well at my convenience.  I don't need to worry about missing them anymore.  I can watch the shows when I have the time and enjoy them.  I like having this choice..

Reviews.Title: Technology On The Move!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Nash "Nichole Nash"
Reviews.Content: XFINITY has done it again with making entertainment technology easy & accessible for their cusomers. This app is very easy to understand and it gives you easy access to your account for all your entertainment needs especially while your traveling on the road, air or sea.  Try it you will love it.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: JEL
Reviews.Content: Maybe I am spoiled by Netflix & Amazon Prime, but to me the selections available on xfinity are really disappointing, we do not have premium channels but all the rest - even the free channels on the Roku have more to offer.  I did not actually try to play anything , as there was nothing available that I found interesting.  I am glad I did not need to pay for this app.I still recommend you try it as long as it's free. Perhaps some day when more people show interest Comcast will improve the selection.

Reviews.Title: I don't have Comcast!
Reviews.Author: songbird
Reviews.Content: I thought that this was going going to be an amazing download but apparently I need a Comcast internet account which I don't have.  So I had to delete the app. If you don't have that internet provider, don't even bother with the app.

Reviews.Title: A Must have for Travellers
Reviews.Author: tstcroix
Reviews.Content: I find this app incredibly useful when traveling, now I don't have to come home to a dvr overflowing with recorded shows I can just watch them on the go. The quality of the video is also really good making it my new favorite app it cemented that place when our ondemand recently was inaccessible for like a week I could still watch all the shows and movies in my package.

Reviews.Title: Not bad!
Reviews.Author: Brianstaugustine
Reviews.Content: Any time I can take CNN to the bathroom is a good thing. Sitting on my back porch watching missed TV shows its nice.

Reviews.Title: Works great on the .Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: ltrull
Reviews.Content: All I had to do was click on the show I wanted to watch, choose the episode and enjoy. Volume Control worked well... at first it was to loud, but was able to adjust. Great sound, even without head phones.

Reviews.Title: Can't open
Reviews.Author: phyyllis mittleman
Reviews.Content: I am having trouble opening it on both I pad and kindle fire HD. Instructions not clear. Sorry I have it.

Reviews.Title: Easy and Nice to pull up shows u watch at home.
Reviews.Author: Coby Jones
Reviews.Content: Easy to use and somewhat fast. Kids love it because they can get all the shows they like on a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Works for me
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Ease, practicality,and many options without a bundle of ads is why I give a four star rating. One of my favorite apps.

Reviews.Title: TOO MANY IMAGES OPEN
Reviews.Author: diane
Reviews.Content: I constantly get a pop up message telling me too many images open. Well it came that way I didn't open them but it doesn't say how to close them!!!also this pops up *.53.Amazon.com and Amazon.com.Inc, then VeriSign Class 3 Secure Server CA-G3Veri Sign, Inc  SO WHAT DOES ALL THIS MEAN? AND HOW DO YOU CLOSE THE NUMEROUS IMAGES?

Reviews.Title: Nice interface!
Reviews.Author: bkay77584
Reviews.Content: Of course you have to be a comcast/xfinity customer but the layout is nice and plenty of shows to watch. Great for catching up on TV series.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Marie Rasnick
Reviews.Content: Who doesn't enjoy watching your favorite shows on the go?  Great product with smooth operation and easy navigation.  Thanks Xfinity!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: tanesha reid
Reviews.Content: Everything was fine love what I pick love it love it love it and the kids are happy thanks you

Reviews.Title: lol at the reviews about volume.
Reviews.Author: Bundren
Reviews.Content: The people who are talking about volume are hilarious. Ummm do some looking around in the settings section people and you will see where you can click yes or no for volume control during payback. It's hilarious how people have to have everything pointed out to them and it has to be right in there face to see otherwise they just complain and give a app that works very well a 1 star review just because they couldn't do some research.

Reviews.Title: mindymbba
Reviews.Author: Mindy Bollinger
Reviews.Content: Love the app and love that can watch a show on my kindle while my kids watch the tv and I can take my showed everywhere I go

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: T. Reed
Reviews.Content: I love this app. With my work schedule I miss most of my favorite shows. With this, I'm able to catch up afterwards on my own time. The movies play well, and I've had no problem with the volume control.

Reviews.Title: comcast?
Reviews.Author: jennie
Reviews.Content: stay away from anything comcast .it is no doubt the worst provider ever.cannot keep up with simple requests or billing or simple costumer service.i tell you by personal experience.also,while most people pay full price for cable,comcast gives cable for a much discounted rate subsidazed by all tax payers...plus who wants to see aljazeera while other more domestic stations get rejected by comcast?no,thanks.

Reviews.Title: nice app
Reviews.Author: CarlsonC
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice app. There is a huge selection of shows to choice from if you are already subscribed.  The buffering, sound, and fast forward/rewind could be tweaked.

Reviews.Title: adequate with some issues
Reviews.Author: Joseph P. Stottmann
Reviews.Content: When using captions, sometimes they stack on each other and are unreadable. Often the video will stop out of the blue and take you back to the episode detail screen. Other than those issues I have been happy and enjoy using the application.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Henney
Reviews.Content: Ok app. Am an Xfinity subscriber and would like to be able to get the bulk of the channels I pay for every month

Reviews.Title: Great App
Reviews.Author: Yvette Laughter
Reviews.Content: I have an hour long commute to and from work.  I ran into a little trouble with buffering but I love that xfinity will let you download the show, then you can watch problem free from anywhere.  Some of my shows don't have all episodes but I can find others easily enough.

Reviews.Title: should be great
Reviews.Author: Kristi Pingel "Kristi"
Reviews.Content: The potential for this app is there. Unfortunately the commercials can take up to 15 minutes while trying to watch a 20 minute show or they freeze and lock you out of a program.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Eric Williams
Reviews.Content: I like it. I wish the controls were a bit better. It plays well, but pausing and restarting are not very intuitive. Still it does what it's supposed to, and it does it fairly well. Give it a try, you might be surprised.

Reviews.Title: Four stars
Reviews.Author: Don Ciccone
Reviews.Content: nice to have but it seems to buffer too long so i think it deserves only four stars in my opinion

Reviews.Title: A mini extension of home cable
Reviews.Author: JamesG "JamieG"
Reviews.Content: I like having this app on my Kindle Fire HD. A little less so on my LG Optimus Elite phone. Cable is so stupidly expensive that t is nice to be able to watch over several devices. The Kindle app has live TV, the LG Optimus does not. Since HBO is included "free" in my cable package I have checked out some movies on both devices. They look okay, definitely not as clear as the streaming on Amazon Prime though, both using the same WiFi connection and device. Also tried them at Starbucks, didn't really work there.  But free is good.

Reviews.Title: Works well for what it is.
Reviews.Author: Ruth Ross
Reviews.Content: Similar to the Netflix app, this allows you to watch Comcast content, but not live TV, and with limited commercials. I guess that makes it more like July. A nice addition to the list. Still waiting to watch TV on my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: xfinity on a kindle
Reviews.Author: Michelle Gianni
Reviews.Content: When I first found out the Amazon created a different version of the app, I thought it would be awful but when I got it and started during it, I learned that I was wrong. This is actually a great app for anyone who wants to see the latest TV shows no matter where they are.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Lisa Wilson
Reviews.Content: I'm always on the go and this app enables me to keep up with my shows. Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: No help dor me...
Reviews.Author: Jessica Helfrich
Reviews.Content: Have not once been able to get it to work. Have tried several times, and it just keeps telling me it can't load.

Reviews.Title: love it.
Reviews.Author: kadozits
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this app. Sometimes it doesn't do what I want but I just go out of it and then back in. Then it works again. Easy to use and navigate, I just wish I could get ppv on it.

Reviews.Title: Works really well on Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Imtelllan
Reviews.Content: Surprised at how well this app works. Had an issue with the buffering. But overall, a good app. And the app is free!!!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent application I love the fact that I can watch any show that I've missed or find new ones to watch

Reviews.Title: GREAT APP
Reviews.Author: J.LOCO
Reviews.Content: GREAT APP , A MUST HAVE FOR THE TV LOVER . ON THE GO ANYWHERE, ANYTIME. NEVER MISS YOUR FAVORITE TV SHOWS AGAIN.

Reviews.Title: great app.
Reviews.Author: felipe
Reviews.Content: let's me keep up with all my shows that I can't see when I'm at work later night. It doesn't show any adds either

Reviews.Title: good but could be better
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Volume will not go load enough, and will not play movies on tv with grim cable hook up, but I do like the app besides that

Reviews.Title: Live TV is great, but a little awkward.
Reviews.Author: culture vulture "culturevulture"
Reviews.Content: The live TV feature is very useful, but a bit hard to control. It took me a while to figure out how to get back out of live TV view to the main menu. I have not tried the other features yet, but I assume they are similar to what I have on my iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Better than my Dvr!
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: I don't have to set a timer, remember the channel or time or take up any space! Just find what I'm looking for bookmark it for future episodes and shazam....I just watched another glorious show in silence (while my kids watched theirs)!! Who doesn't love that?!

Reviews.Title: Good but choppy
Reviews.Author: Jacob Bulicek
Reviews.Content: There were times when this app worked seamlessly but other times when the video died.  It's good but could be better.

Reviews.Title: One problem
Reviews.Author: sarahjg2
Reviews.Content: I love it, but for some reason on my new kindle fire HD when I watch several shows in a row from a season on streamline it freezes. The only thing that fixes it is restarting the Kindle.  Leaving the app and going back in doesn't work. This didn't happen on my old crappy tablet. I'm wondering if it's bc the other version was downloaded from the Google play store.

Reviews.Title: Corrupted install...twice.  Any suggestions?
Reviews.Author: Regan Sonnabend
Reviews.Content: I downloaded this, then when I tried to download a show as opposed to streaming it, it kept throwing errors.  Eventually got one that said the installation was corrupted, so I uninstalled and reinstalled, but had the same result.  Has anyone else had this problem?  Amazon app store, any suggestions or workarounds?  This specific app is what I need because I want my girls to be able to watch downloaded shows without using data while traveling.Thanks in advance!

Reviews.Title: not bad for free
Reviews.Author: Bill Doerr
Reviews.Content: This app works very well. It would be great if you could watch current tv shows. I am very happy with this app. I plan on using this app but it would be great if you could watch live tv

Reviews.Title: Five Stars for free shows
Reviews.Author: M Eric Stelnick
Reviews.Content: I am totally enjoying free shows that have sentimental meaning for me.And in today's world where not much is free anymore, I for one am very grateful.

Reviews.Title: kindle HD..
Reviews.Author: RHONDA MOORE
Reviews.Content: LOVE this app.  No problems.  Let's me follow and keep up with whatever series or movie I have been watching on Showtime.  Nice to download and watch it when  I want to or can watch it without downloading.  I have had no problems with internet when I use it and no problems with buffering.  Nice to have when going on a trip or for a doctor's appointment or just anytime.

Reviews.Title: Okay product
Reviews.Author: Tim Seattle
Reviews.Content: It does not work with all the boxes in the house. Good idea but it needs to be improve. it is okay.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't Watch Game
Reviews.Author: DEBGLO "Lucy"
Reviews.Content: Wanted to watch N.O. Saints vs. Seahawks...had to download ESPN app no problem.  Watched ESPN up until game came on and then it locked me out of game!!!!!  Said I couldn't watch the game on this device.  It was a Kindle fire.  It's pretty bad when you pay for the station thru xfinity but they choose what you see.  Not a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: not impressed.
Reviews.Author: Miss100
Reviews.Content: 99% of the shows are subscription only. The app may be free but the shows are not...totally unimpressed, I expected more.

Reviews.Title: Great player!
Reviews.Author: K. Potts
Reviews.Content: This app has exceeded my expectations.  Someone commented that the volume on the Kindle Fire is low.  I did not have that problem, and was actually able to clean my kitchen - hand washing dishes - while listening to The Voice this evening.  This is like having Comcast on demand available on the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: T. D. Hersman
Reviews.Content: Ever since this app was updated, it has been jumpy and unusable. It is a great idea that has been poorly implemented.

Reviews.Title: Excellent App!
Reviews.Author: Jamie Slone
Reviews.Content: I love this.  You can even watch live tv on some channels, and it has tons of on demand content.

Reviews.Title: Favorite app for Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: gimeabrak "POKERGIRL007"
Reviews.Content: Great layout, user friendly app. Now I can use just this one app instead of all the separate Network  Great job Xfinity!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: tonize
Reviews.Content: Unlike the separate movie channel apps, on this app I can watch movies from ANY channel I subscribe to. I have both Encore and Movieplex and could not use  their individual apps.

Reviews.Title: Cie
Reviews.Author: Cie
Reviews.Content: I like having this app along with HBOGO and Netflix it gives me a variety of choices. I don't watch certain shows because  of the commercial interruptions and I can see them without on the other two apps.

Reviews.Title: good for an app
Reviews.Author: Eugene Casey
Reviews.Content: It works for what I need it for. Haven't had any issues since downloading the app. Just wish I could connect to my home dvr. I thought that you could.

Reviews.Title: doesn't work when trying to open ap for on demand
Reviews.Author: richard robbins
Reviews.Content: doesn't work.  click on demand and it says error when trying to run ap.  How many more words do you need.

Reviews.Title: love this app
Reviews.Author: erin b
Reviews.Content: This app works wonderfully. I am able to watch everything on my kindle.It's easy to find my shows. It's as easy as watching on a television.

Reviews.Title: Great App

Reviews.Title: Has some occasional glitches
Reviews.Author: bmiz311
Reviews.Content: This app is great, & for the small fee for Streampix I got rid of Netflix. I pay $4.95 for Streampix & I get more use out of it than I did with Netflix or Hulu. Good value, especially if you like binge-watching tv shows. I was hoping that the new added "live" tv option included more channels, but hopefully the selections will grow soon.I have experienced problems loading episodes (or movies) recently, putting me without the service twice.... once for 2 hours, & once for almost 2 DAYS. The problem went away, but I never got even a reply when I contacted customer support through the correct channels. That was disappointing, if only because Comcast advertises about their "amazing" comment to cust svs all the darn time. But the problem DID go away, which ultimately matters most, & it hasn't happened since. - 1 star for false promises.

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: It is amazing, I wish it had teen wolf, but other than that it had good connection, loads quickly, and had good options. What more can I ask for? Teen Wolf. I can ask for Teen Wolf, but other than THAT, it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great app

Reviews.Title: I like it...I use it...I'm happy!

Reviews.Title: smiley
Reviews.Content: I Love this app! Except for when it sometimes doesn't work, it's awesome. Here's some tips for if the app isn't responding. First of all, you should check to see how many apps are running.  If you have a lot of apps running, then the player may go slower. If you fix this problem and the app still isn't working, then press the power button on your kindle for 30 seconds and after that turn the device back on.  If you still experience issues, I would lastly recommend to delete and re-download the player. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Love This App

Reviews.Title: Not as great as the online Xfinity website, but provides some on-demand shows
Reviews.Author: Jim Hyatt "James"
Reviews.Content: Obviously, this app requires a paid subscription to Comcast's Xfinity services.  If you have their more premium packages, this app can be nice for occasional TV watching.  However, I have used both this app and the Xfinity website.  I have found the online website to be easier and better than using up the battery on my Kindle Fire.This Kindle Fire app allows access to some premium shows (if you have a valid subscription to them); however, the app doesn't provide as much on-demand access as the online site.  I can watch multiple high-quality channels live online (ESPN, ESPN2, etc).  When it came to on-demand content, I was able to search and find additional shows and content on my computer.Overall, if you know what you want will be available through this app, then it does work well.

The ability to watch the movies you've purchased through Comcast being a big one... the reason I bought the movies there is so I didn't have to jump through hoops to link it into a UV > Flixter account to watch it. If this feature was available this app would be much more useful.The other feature is actually having parental controls. Right now, the only option is to show (or not show) adult movies. I think a basic function would be to allow you to choose the ratings that you allow on a device. For example, I would like to limit the movies to G, and PG. There is a Family category, but I would have to instruct my kids to navigate to that specific section and not the others. If they click on a different movie outside of the rating group, there's nothing stopping them from watching it.When these options are worked into the app, I'll happily be back to try it out again. But until then, this one's removed.

Reviews.Title: Negative reviews?!! Free. Awesome audio fidelity. Awesome HD. No Commercials!! Get It!!
Reviews.Author: B. Williams ""We must be the change we wi...
Reviews.Content: I've only used this app a couple of times so far, but it hasn't failed to give me what I've been looking for. My old Comcast account is now maintained by others, even though I retain sole access right now, yet that account also gives me access to this. Unlike Crackle and even Hulu, I can watch movies without commercials. I'm watching them in full HD. I can rewind to the beginning, or slide to where I left off.  I'm also not sure what people mean about being unable to control the volume. I have no difficulty there. I can make it so faint I can barely hear it, or so loud that it hurts my ears (perhaps those people have burned their ears out by listening to their mp3's too loud their whole lives?). The stereo in my ear buds is awesome (I have the Monster Earth, Wind & Fire buds), and I can't wait to try it with my bluetooth speakers. In all, I have no serious complaints. In fact, even through I've had my Fire HD 8.0" practically from its introduction to the market, this is the first time I've reviewed an app... both because it is worthy of a review, and also because it is unworthy of the negative reviews it's received.  Again, Free doesn't get much better than this, and the apps that one actually has to pay for often have lousy audio fidelity, commercials, and streaming that can't maintain the video in HD.  Give this a chance before giving it the bypass. You have nothing to lose, after all, except for time, perhaps. At least you're not losing any $$.
